head.title: Digital signature search in {{FileFormatUp}} by {{ProgLang}}
head.description: Leverage the {{ProdFullName}} API to search for signatures within {{FileFormatUp}} files. Find various types of signatures in PDFs, Word, Excel, Presentations, and Images.

header.title: Search digital signatures in {{FileFormatUp}}
header.description: Retrieve a complete list of e-signatures embedded in PDF, Word, Excel, Presentations, or Image files using {{ProdFullName}}.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) offers powerful features for signing documents. It supports adding text, images, barcodes, digital certificates, and stamps to files in 60+ formats, including PDFs, MS Office documents, Images, ZIP files, and other common business formats. In addition, you can search, verify, modify, or delete signatures at any time.

more_features.title: Comprehensive document signing solution
more_features.description: We are proud to introduce our document signing solution, compatible with all major document formats. Add a wide range of signatures to enhance your documents or secure their content.

feature_1.title: Sign business documents
feature_1.content: Insert digital signatures at any position on any page of a document. Use a variety of signature types, such as text, images, barcodes, metadata, stamps, or digital certificates.

feature_2.title: Manage signatures
feature_2.content: After signing, documents may require further processing. Search for all available signatures, and update or delete them whenever necessary.

feature_3.title: Protect document content
feature_3.content: Manage hidden metadata embedded in the document. Add new metadata or remove existing entries. Use corporate digital certificates to safeguard the documentâ€™s content from unauthorized alterations.

formats.title: Search signatures in various file formats
formats.description: {{ProdFullName}} API enables you to retrieve the list of signatures from any signed file. Extract signatures from popular file formats for further processing.

operations.title: Supported operations
operations.description: Our product offers a flexible API for signing documents and managing signatures after signing.
